malay.text: One who sits by the well will never go thirsty.
Milk belongs to the cow, but the bull cow gets the publicity.
No matter how high the squirrel jumps, it will eventually fall onto the ground.
On which soil we stand on, that is where we carry the weight of the sky.
One can pay back the loan of gold, but one dies forever in debt to those who are kind.
Prepare the umbrella before it rains.
Smack a tray of water and you get to wash your face.
The earth compared to the sky.
The existence of the sea means the existence of pirates.
The more shoots, the more leaves.
The more sorrow one encounters, the more joy one can contain.
A fool is like the big drum that beats fast but does not realize its hollowness.
A heavy load should be borne together as well as a light load.
After Falling, The ladder falls on you.
An ox with long horns, even if he does not butt, will be accused of butting.
An unasked excuse infers transgression.
Ants die in sugar.
As long as you happen to put your hand in a container full of pickles, might as well dip your whole arm in the container.
Because of a drop of blue dye,a whole pot of milk is contaminated.
Because of lack of talent in dancing, the floor is blamed.
Bit by bit, in the end it becomes a hill.
The Potato grows in silence, The iron corrodes in silence.
The turtle lays thousands of eggs without anyone knowing, but when the hen lays an egg, the whole country is informed.
Think before you leap.
Though a tree grow ever so high, the falling leaves return to the ground.
Though a tree grows so high, the falling leaves return to the root.
Tigers die and leave their stripes, but humans die leaving their names.
To bend a bamboo, start when it is a shoot.
United we stand, divided we fall.
Where there is sugar, there are bound to be ants.
You can't get at the precious sago without first breaking the bark.
calf is given, but then thigh is requested.
Clapping with the right hand only will not produce a noise.
Do not think that placid water is without crocodiles.
Gold rain drops on a foreign country,wherelse rain of stones drops on our country,but our country is better.
If there is no reason, why would the tempua bird nest on the low branches?
If you have, give; if you lack, seek.
If you want something, you'll do a thousand things to obtain it. But if you don't want something, you'll give a thousand excuses to refrain from it.
Though a tree grows so high, the falling leaves return to the root.
Though change be no robbery.
To bend a bamboo, start when it is a shoot.
Trumpet in a herd of elephants; crow in the company of cocks; bleat in a flock of goats.
Where there is sugar, there are bound to be ants.
Where there's a carcass, there will be vultures.
You can't get at the precious sago without first breaking the bark.
If you have, give; if you lack, seek.
One can pay back the loan of gold, but one dies forever in debt to those who are kind.
One who sits by the well will never go thirsty.
Smack a tray of water and you get to wash your face.
The deep sea can be fathomed, but who knows the hearts of men?
The existence of the sea means the existence of pirates.
The more shoots, the more leaves.
The more sorrow one encounters, the more joy one can contain.
The turtle lays thousands of eggs without anyone knowing, but when the hen lays an egg, the whole country is informed.
Though a tree grow ever so high, the falling leaves return to the ground.
A fool is like the big drum that beats fast but does not realize its hollowness.
An ox with long horns, even if he does not butt, will be accused of butting.
An unasked excuse infers transgression.
Ants die in sugar.
Anything with scales counts as fish.
Clapping with the right hand only will not produce a noise.
Do not measure another man's coat on your body.
Don't think there are no crocodiles because the water is calm.
He who has learned how to steal, must learn how to hang.
If there is no reason, why would the tempua bird nest on the low branches?
Just because you are irritated by a mosquito, you burn the mosquito curtain.
Like a monkey who eats belacaan.
Like the peanut, who forgets its shell.
The turtle lays thousands of eggs without anyone knowing, but when the hen lays an egg, the whole country is informed.
Though a tree grow ever so high, the falling leaves return to the ground.
An ox with long horns, even if he does not butt, will be accused of butting.
He who has learned how to steal, must learn how to hang.
If there is no reason, why would the tempua bird nest on the low branches?
The existence of the sea means the existence of pirates.
The deep sea can be fathomed, but who knows the hearts of men?
The turtle lays thousands of eggs without anyone knowing, but when the hen lays an egg, the whole country is informed.
A fool is like the big drum that beats fast but does not realize its hollowness.
Do not measure another man’s coat on your body.
Where there is sugar, there are bound to be ants.
